title: Topic 001 Question 028
body: Note: This question is part of a series of questions that present the same scenario. Each question in the series contains a unique solution that might meet the stated goals. Some question sets might have more than one correct solution, while others might not have a correct solution.
After you answer a question in this section, you will NOT be able to return to it. As a result, these questions will not appear in the review screen.
You create a web app named app1 that runs on an Azure virtual machine named vm1. Vm1 is on an Azure virtual network named vnet1.
You plan to create a new Azure Cognitive Search service named service1.
You need to ensure that app1 can connect directly to service1 without routing traffic over the public internet.
Solution: You deploy service1 and a private endpoint to vnet1.
